item.title: Putting Harriet Tubman On The $20 Makes Her The New Face Of America's Debt Slavery
item.description:
Putting Harriet Tubman On The $20 Makes Her The New Face Of America's Debt Slavery

Independent Journal Opinion is an opinion platform and any opinions or information put forth by contributors are exclusive to them and do not represent Independent Journal. Recently, I spoke about Harriet Tubman and adding her likeness to the $20 dollar bill, and it ignited thoughtful controversy.

item.title: Facebook betting on VR porn to boost Oculus demand
item.description:
Facebook betting on VR porn to boost Oculus demand

As Oculus VR finally ships its virtual-reality headsets to the public, it's heralding the potential of video games and movies - but it's also quietly giving a wink to porn producers. The Facebook-owned startup announced Monday that its new "Rift" headset has more than 30 games available as the first units ship this week, with 100 titles expected by the end of 2016.
